intro: Isostigma speciosum, commonly known as the showy isostigma, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes many milkweed species. The plant is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of red, orange, or yellow.
